questions.question_text: Which two statements about Zones on Cisco Video Communication Server (VCS) are correct? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Bandwidth for calls between endpoints in the same zone cannot be restricted.
choices.D: Endpoints are associated to default subzone or any customized subzone depending on the IP address of the endpoint.
choices.A: You can register endpoints to default zone.
choices.E: A neighbor zone connects Cisco VCS Core to other systems via SIP or H.323.
choices.C: A neighbor zone connects Cisco VCS to Cisco VCS Expressway for NAT, PAT, and firewall traversal.

questions.question_text: An engineer wants to change a dialed URI into another format in Cisco VCS. Which location does the engineer navigate to accomplish this task?

An engineer wants to allow more calls on the WAN link from the head office to a branch. The region setting has been changed from G711 to G729. Which other configuration in Cisco Unified Communications Manager must be updated to accomplish this goal?

discussion.content: Sorry I mean D as correct answer

All are incorrect.
Class Class1
set ip precedence 5

Class 2
set ip dscp ef

choices.D: policy-map policy1 class class1 set ip dscp 5 class class2 set ip dscp CS3
choices.C: policy-map policy1 class class1 set ip dscp ef class class2 set ip dscp 5
choices.A: policy-map policy1 class class1 set ip dscp 5 class class2 set ip dscp ef
choices.B: policy-map policy1 class class1 set ip dscp 3 class class2 set ip dscp ef

questions.question_text: Which configuration for setting the IP DSCP value in the ToS byte to 5 and Expedited Forwarding is correct?

discussion.content:
the right answer is A.
For example, a user logs on to a Cisco Unified IP Phone 7960, for which there is a user device profile.
The user device profile for the user gets downloaded to the phone to which the user logged on. Later, the
same user logs on to a Cisco Unified IP Phone 7940, for which he does not have a user device profile.
In this case, the default device profile for the 7940 gets downloaded to the phone

questions.question_text: A CUCM end user with Extension Mobility is associated with an 8851 phone and 8851 device profile. However, the user logs into a Cisco 8941, which device profile will be used?
